portfolio.title: Audi
portfolio.description: Responsible for creating a intranet site for delivering numerous programs, and events associated for Audi. The site is build on individual components wiring up the data using an MVVM model.
portfolio.technologyStack: Technologies used: Azure, CSS(BEM), HTML5, Javascript, MVVM, Responsive Design, SQL Server, TypeScript
portfolio.footnoteDescription: All work created and distributed while working at Touchstone Group Associates.
